name: nzbget
description: NZBGet is a Usenet downloader optimized for performance and low resource usage. It supports automation scripts, web UI, scheduling, and multi-threading with a lightweight daemon for self-hosting.

features.title: Usenet Downloading
features.description: Efficient binary file downloading from Usenet newsgroups using NZB files

features.title: Multi
features.description: Parallel connections maximize download speed and bandwidth utilization

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage downloads, view queue, and configure settings through browser UI

features.title: Post
features.description: Automatically unpack, verify, and organize downloads with custom scripts

features.title: Rss Feeds
features.description: Subscribe to feeds for automatic downloading of new releases

features.title: Scheduling
features.description: Set download speed limits and schedules to manage bandwidth usage

features.title: Priority Queue
features.description: Organize downloads by priority with pause, resume, and reorder capabilities

features.title: Duplicate Detection
features.description: Avoid downloading the same content multiple times with smart checking
